name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Stephen PERSON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Stephen PERSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of May, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
44 A.3d 653
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Stephen PERSON, Petitioner.
No. 30 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 23, 2012.
